docs.title: Commands
docs.text:
• mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project.
  • mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server.
  • mkdocs build - Build the documentation site.
  • mkdocs -h - Print help message and exit.

docs.title: Project layout
docs.text:
mkdocs.yml    # The configuration file.
docs/
    index.md  # The documentation homepage.
    ...       # Other markdown pages, images and other files.

docs.title: Misc
docs.text: Mod Notes Blended Roads FOMOD: Install Blended Roads (not "REALly" Blended) and the SMIM patch. Cathedral - 3D Rocky Shores Creation Club Open Helmets Enhanced Vanilla Trees Recommended: Enhanced Vanilla Trees SE-Basic Fluffworks (Fluffy Animals) Recommended: Fluffworks Quality HD Reworked Baskets HD Reworked Bears HD Reworked Cows HD Reworked Dogs HD Reworked Dragonplate Armor HD Reworked Dragons Collection HD Reworked Falmer Architecture HD Reworked Farmhouses HD Reworked Horses HD Reworked Mammoths HD Reworked Ores HD Reworked Pelts HD Reworked Shellbug HD Reworked Trolls HD Reworked Wolves Happy Little Trees - DLC Trees Happy Little Trees - Lighter Pine Trees Happy Little Trees Add-On - DynDOLOD 3 Happy Little Trees Merge the HLT Patch update file. High Poly Vanilla Hair Improved closefaced helmets Iron Armors and Weapons - Environment Mapped Merge the CC Open Helmet Patch file. Iron Armors and Weapons Retexture SE Majestic Mountains Recommended: Lightside Realistic Skin And Hair Shaders - Giants Realistic Skin Shaders - Falmer and Hagravens Simplicity of Sea Skyland Happy Little Trees Bark Recommended: 2K

docs.title: Shaders
docs.text: Mod Notes Auto Parallax Edit AutoParallax.ini and set bAutoEnableParallax = true.
